name: Brigands and Barbarians
summary:
Brigands and Barbarians is the RPG that let's you tap your way to treasure and old-school adventure! Choose from five avatars including Barbarians, Brigands, Archer, Wizard, and Sorceress. Defeat the evil goblins and dragons as you cleanse the lands of Charedon of their evil stench!
Only you through the power of your nimble fingers can save this land. Only your quick touch can slay the mighty dragon! Wait no more and dare to enter this land of adventure!
